definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of foregoing (si vera 1.) only in phr. [[עַל־הַגִּתִּית]] in three Psalm titles: Ps 8:1, Ps 81:1, Ps 84:1; upon the Gittite (lyre) so Targum,to the Gittite (melody) Ew Ol De, or either of these Hup Pe ; LXX Vulgate [[הַגִּתּׂת]] wine-presses, whence Bae al. at the wine-presses, i.e. (Bae) a song for the feast of booths.
